Title: TFS Plug-in for CruiseControl.NET
Description: A plug-in to allow communication with Team Foundation Server for the popular open source build automation tool CruiseControl.NET

CruiseControl.NET plug-in for Team Foundation Server

Welcome to the new home of the CC.NET Plugin for Team Foundation Server. Previously this project lived on SourceForge as VSTSPlugins - however its been moved to CodePlex as that seems like a better home for a Team Foundation Server related task and also because it allows us to dogfood the plug-in.

To Download the plug-in click here.
  • Plug-in for TFS2008
  • Plug-in for TFS2005

Documentation for it can be found over at the CruiseControl.NET wiki - http://confluence.public.thoughtworks.org/x/zRE.

But, if you just want to know how to configure the plug-in to talk to CodePlex then see the following:-
  • Configuring For CodePlex

Thanks,

Martin.
